author: Special Correspondent
text:
Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) Puducherry unit president V. Saminathan on Monday said that his party would decide its poll strategy within a week.

On Friday he met Prime Minister Narendra Modi, party chief Amit Shah and members of the national election committee to finalise the poll strategy and the preliminary list of candidates for the May 16 Assembly polls.

Vote-bank

Talking to reporters here on Monday, Mr. Saminathan said the party increased its vote-bank substantially and had prepared list of probable candidates to all 30 constituencies.

It comprises a mix of young faces, graduates and women, he said.

“Irrespective of whether we have an alliance or not, we are prepared to face the polls. The national leaders of the party will take a decision on alliance in a week and later will come to Puducherry to release the list of candidates,” said Mr. Saminathan.

title: ‘BJP to finalise poll strategy within a week’
